Question: Are there either small spoons or forks?

Reference Answer: no

Image path: ./sampled_GQA/n433532.jpg

Original program:

```
BOX0=LOC(image=IMAGE,object='spoon')
IMAGE0=CROP(image=IMAGE,box=BOX0)
BOX1=LOC(image=IMAGE0,object='small')
ANSWER0=COUNT(box=BOX1)
BOX2=LOC(image=IMAGE,object='forks')
ANSWER1=COUNT(box=BOX2)
ANSWER2=EVAL(expr="'yes' if {ANSWER0} > 0 or {ANSWER1} > 0 else 'no'")
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER2)
```
Program:

```
ANSWER0=VQA(image=IMAGE,question="Are there either small spoons or forks?")
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Rationale:

<hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">,&nbsp;<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='Are there either small spoons or forks?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>spoons</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: red;'>RESULT</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: green;'>spoons</span></b></div><hr>

Answer: spoons
